lines.text:
[while being threatened with a pitchfork]
Ahhhhh!
Go ahead, scream if you'd like. To be perfectly honest, I'm really starting to get quite bored with this whole thing.
You're the guy from the pub, aren't you? The one that attacked Nick?

Ridiculous isn't it? I mean, I have to kill, I have no choice in the matter, but you think they'd let me try something else as well. I do have other talents as well. There's no sense in you trying to run for it, really. You'll get ten feet, and run into a branch, or stumble over a root.
[she starts running and does indeed trip and fall]
See! What did I tell you?
